testsuite.name: member

testcase.name: create member
testcase.failure:

title ==~ /Member Listagem/ | | | false Ver Member

testsuite.system-out:
@i9n Feature: member As an administrator of the RGMS system I want to add, remove and modify users in the system.
--Output from new member-- Scenario: new member # Member.feature:7 Given the system has no member with username "usernametest" # MemberSteps.groovy:11 When I create a member with username "usernametest" # MemberSteps.groovy:16 Then the member with username "usernametest" is properly stored by the system # MemberSteps.groovy:20
--Output from delete member-- Scenario: delete member # Member.feature:12 Given the system has member with username "usernametest" # MemberSteps.groovy:57 When I delete a member with username "usernametest" # MemberSteps.groovy:63 Then the member with "usernametest" doesnt exist # MemberSteps.groovy:67
--Output from new member with existing username-- Scenario: new member with existing username # Member.feature:17 Given the system has member with username "usernametest" # MemberSteps.groovy:57 When I create the member with username "usernametest" # MemberSteps.groovy:80 Then the member "usernametest" is not registered # MemberSteps.groovy:84
--Output from login with incorrect password-- Scenario: login with incorrect password # Member.feature:23 Given I am at the login page # MemberSteps.groovy:26 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == true When I fill username and password with "admin" and "incorrectpassword" # MemberSteps.groovy:33 Then I am still on the login page with an error message # MemberSteps.groovy:37
--Output from user registration-- Scenario: user registration # Member.feature:28 ENTROU no registerparams NULL Given I am at the register page # MemberSteps.groovy:42 When I fill the user details with "jose" "josesilva" "123456" "123456" "jose@ufpe.br" "UFPE" "Graduate Student" # MemberSteps.groovy:47 Then I am still on the register page with the message user created # MemberSteps.groovy:52
--Output from create member-- Scenario: create member # Member.feature:33 ENTROU no signIn Enabled == trueENTROU NO TRYJefferson Almeida Given I am at the create member page # MemberSteps.groovy:91 When I fill the user details with "jose" "josesilva" "jose@ufpe.br" "UFPE" # MemberSteps.groovy:99 Then I am on the list page # MemberSteps.groovy:104 Assertion failed:
title ==~ /Member Listagem/ | | | false Ver Member
